title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Selection of mining methods, In-seam and horizon mining systems, Pillar mining methods: application, layout, development and extraction by conventional and continuous methods; Longwall mining methods: application, development, layout, and extraction by partially and fully mechanized mining methods; Stowing of goaf, Room and Pillar development, Blasting gallery methods, Wide stall system.
